name: BuccaneersFan
0:
”Alexa, open Buccaneers fan.”
”Alexa, ask Buccaneers fan for a flash briefing on the Buccaneers.”
”Alexa, ask Buccaneers fan about the previous game score.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: buccaneers fan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Buccaneers by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Buccaneers.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Buccaneers Fan how are the Buccaneers doing? 

Alexa, ask Buccaneers Fan who do the Buccaneers play next?

Alexa, ask Buccaneers Fan Jameis Winston (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Buccaneers:


Alexa, ask Buccaneers Fan to tell me some trivia about the Buccaneers. 

Alexa, ask Buccaneers Fan how many Super Bowls have the Buccaneers won?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
